# We are [HostCram LLC](https://www.hostcram.com "HostCram LLC"),
a US based Wyoming registered company ([Filling ID 2016-000736577](https://wyobiz.wyo.gov/Business/FilingDetails.aspx?eFNum=153014087255104045146212210168127209107237105253 "Filling ID 2016-000736577")) posting our brand new i9-11900K VPS Hosting deals offer on LowEndTalk.

**Our company registration can be [verified here](https://wyobiz.wyo.gov/Business/FilingDetails.aspx?eFNum=153014087255104045146212210168127209107237105253 "verified here").**

## Our VPS Hosting services includes:

All new Dell Branded Hardware
Intel® Core™ i9-11900K Processor
Samsung NVMe SSD Storage
3200 MHz DDR4 RAM
1 Gbps Bandwidth (AS39618 via Juniper router)
Free /48 IPv6 Prefix on request
Linux & Windows OS
Full Root Access


## LXC-1G

1 vCPU Core
1 GB DDR4 RAM
20 GB NVMe SSD Storage
1 TB Bandwidth @ 1 Gbps Port
1 Dedicated IPv4 

**[Order now : $1 first month, renews at $3.50 month](https://my.hostcram.com/order/config/index/lxc-vps-hosting/?group_id=3&pricing_id=546&coupon=WeLoveLET "Order now : $1 first month, renews at $3.50 month")**
Coupon code: WeLoveLET

## KVM-1G

1 vCPU Core
1 GB DDR4 RAM
20 GB NVMe SSD Storage
1 TB Bandwidth @ 1 Gbps Port
1 Dedicated IPv4 

**[Order now : $5 month](https://my.hostcram.com/order/config/index/kvm-vps-hosting/?group_id=18&pricing_id=545 "Order now : $5 month")**

## LXC-2G

1 vCPU Core
2 GB DDR4 RAM
40 GB NVMe SSD Storage
2 TB Bandwidth @ 1 Gbps Port
1 Dedicated IPv4 

**[Order now : $7 month](https://my.hostcram.com/order/config/index/lxc-vps-hosting/?group_id=3&pricing_id=361 "Order now : $7 month")**

Our terms of service can be found [here](https://www.hostcram.com/tos "here").

## Accepted primary payment methods:
Debit/Credit Cards, PayPal, Payoneer and Bank Transfer (Ask for others)

## Datacenter info:
Carrier-1 Data Centers,
1515 Round Table Dr, Dallas, TX 75247

## Network info:
AS39618 - HostCram LLC
Internap, Level3 & HE Bandwidth

**Limited stock available.** Each order will be reviewed manually. All questions are answerable via [support ticket](https://my.hostcram.com/dashboard/plugin/support_managerpro/client_tickets/departments/ "support ticket") and [live chat](https://www.hostcram.com "live chat"). Don't forget to read our [TOS](https://www.hostcram.com/tos "TOS"), [AUP](https://www.hostcram.com/aup "AUP") & [Privacy Policy](https://www.hostcram.com/privacy-policy "Privacy Policy") before signing up. Thanks.
